newsitem.title: DUBAI: PLO receives $1 million in donations from Saudi.
newsitem.headline: PLO receives $1 million in donations from Saudi.

text.p: Saudi Arabia on Sunday sent the Palestine Liberation Organisation $1 million in donations.
The Saudi Press Agency said the transfer to the PLO by the Popular Committee for the Support of the Mujahideen of Palestine was the first since the Islamic year started in May.

Palestinians in the diaspora are obliged to pay five percent of their salaries to the PLO. Most Gulf Arab states collect the funds and transfer them to the PLO every two months in addition to private donations and generous state grants.
